form.label: SH - 01 - GMC Assets & Identities - Dashboard - v1.5.90

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_assets_kv_store_lookup | fields Splunk_Instance Splunk_Roles serverName host host_short host_fqdn host_resolved host_ip idxcluster_label shcluster_label mode guid version build os_name os_name_extended cpu_arch os_version os_build startup_time kvStoreStatus numberOfCores numberOfVirtualCores physicalMemoryMB rtsearch_enabled master_uri master_guid licenseState isForwarding isTrial license_labels transparent_hugepages_defrag transparent_hugepages_effective_state transparent_hugepages_enabled ulimits_core_file_size ulimits_cpu_time ulimits_data_file_size ulimits_data_segment_size ulimits_nice ulimits_open_files ulimits_resident_memory_size ulimits_stack_size ulimits_user_processes ulimits_virtual_address_space_size SPLUNK_DB SPLUNK_HOME appServerPorts dfsDisabled dfsMasterPort enableSplunkWebSSL httpport kvStoreDisabled kvStorePort mgmtHostPort minFreeSpace sessionTimeout startwebserver trustedIP | eval isForwarding = if (match(Splunk_Roles, "indexer"), "N/A", isForwarding) | fillnull value="Undefined" idxcluster_label shcluster_label | search Splunk_Instance="*$Splunk_Instance$*" Splunk_Roles="*$Splunk_Roles$*" os_name="$os_name$" version="$version$" isForwarding="$isForwarding$" kvStoreDisabled="$kvStoreDisabled$" enableSplunkWebSSL="$enableSplunkWebSSL$" startwebserver="$startwebserver$" idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label$" shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" guid="*$guid$*" host_ip="$host_ip$"

| from lookup:splunk_identities_kv_store_lookup | fields shcluster_label,identity,prefix,nick,first,last,suffix,email,phone,phone2,managedBy,priority,bunit,category,watchlist,startDate,endDate,work_city,work_country,work_lat,work_long,work_region,emp_cc,emp_dep,emp_floor,emp_lob,emp_loc,emp_name,emp_status,emp_ttl,emp_type,emp_tz,Splunk_Instance,splunk_role_map,ldap_group_name,ldap_group_type,last_successful_login | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_splunk_roles_info(shcluster_label,splunk_role_map)` | stats Max(cumulativeRTSrchJobsQuota) As cumulativeRTSrchJobsQuota Max(cumulativeSrchJobsQuota) As cumulativeSrchJobsQuota Max(imported_rtSrchJobsQuota) As imported_rtSrchJobsQuota Max(imported_srchDiskQuota) As imported_srchDiskQuota Max(imported_srchJobsQuota) As imported_srchJobsQuota Max(rtSrchJobsQuota) As rtSrchJobsQuota Max(srchDiskQuota) As srchDiskQuota Max(srchJobsQuota) As srchJobsQuota Values(imported_srchFilter) As imported_srchFilter Values(imported_srchIndexesAllowed) As imported_srchIndexesAllowed Values(imported_srchIndexesDefault) As imported_srchIndexesDefault Values(imported_srchTimeWin) As imported_srchTimeWin Values(bunit) As bunit Values(Contractor_Expiration) As Contractor_Expiration Values(defaultApp) As defaultApp Values(deleteIndexesAllowed) As deleteIndexesAllowed Values(email) As email Values(emp_cc) As emp_cc Values(emp_dep) As emp_dep Values(emp_floor) As emp_floor Values(emp_lob) As emp_lob Values(emp_loc) As emp_loc Values(emp_name) As emp_name Values(emp_status) As emp_status Values(emp_ttl) As emp_ttl Values(emp_type) As emp_type Values(endDate) As endDate Values(federatedProviders) As federatedProviders Values(first) As first Values(grantable_roles) As grantable_roles Values(imported_roles) As imported_roles Values(last) As last Values(last_successful_login) As last_successful_login Values(locked-out) As locked-out Values(managedBy) As managedBy Values(phone) As phone Values(splunk_role_map) As splunk_role_map Values(srchFilter) As srchFilter Values(srchIndexesAllowed) As srchIndexesAllowed Values(srchIndexesDefault) As srchIndexesDefault Values(srchTimeWin) As srchTimeWin Values(startDate) As startDate Values(type) As type Values(work_city) As work_city Values(work_country) As work_country Values(work_region) As work_region Values(capabilities) As capabilities Values(imported_capabilities) As imported_capabilities Values(ldap_group_name) As ldap_group_name Values(ldap_group_type) As ldap_group_type By shcluster_label identity | eval srchJobsQuota_Final = if(imported_srchJobsQuota > srchJobsQuota, imported_srchJobsQuota ,srchJobsQuota) | fillnull value="undefined" shcluster_label Splunk_Instance Splunk_Roles identity emp_type emp_status work_city work_region work_country emp_loc emp_dep emp_lob emp_cc emp_name splunk_role_map ldap_group_name ldap_group_type last_successful_login capabilities imported_capabilities imported_roles | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles$" identity="*$identity$*" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" work_city="$work_city$" work_region="$work_region$" work_country="$work_country$" emp_loc="$emp_loc$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_lob="$emp_lob$" emp_cc="$emp_cc$" emp_name="$emp_name$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance$" splunk_role_map="$splunk_role_map$" ldap_group_name="$ldap_group_name$" ldap_group_type="$ldap_group_type$" last_successful_login="$last_successful_login$" capabilities="$capabilities$" imported_capabilities="$imported_capabilities$" imported_roles="$imported_roles$"

index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_disk_objects component=Partitions search_group=* `gmc_comment("search_group=dmc_group_indexer")` | rename data.* as * , host As Splunk_Instance | fields _time Splunk_Instance mount_point fs_type available capacity free | eval free = if(isnotnull(available), available, free) | `get_idxcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | fillnull value="Undefined" idxcluster_label | stats latest(*) as * by idxcluster_label Splunk_Instance mount_point | `gmc_mb2human(capacity,$round_tok2$)` | `gmc_mb2human(free,$round_tok2$)` | rename free As free_MB capacity As capacity_MB | search idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label2$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance2$" mount_point="$mount_point$"

| eval Time_Since_Startup_Time = now() - startup_time | `gmc_convert_runtime(Time_Since_Startup_Time)` | convert ctime(startup_time) | eval Memory = round (physicalMemoryMB / 1024, 2) | table Splunk_Instance idxcluster_label shcluster_label host_fqdn guid host_short host_ip version numberOfCores numberOfVirtualCores Memory os_name os_version startup_time Time_Since_Startup_Time isForwarding ulimits_open_files ulimits_stack_size ulimits_user_processes transparent_hugepages_defrag transparent_hugepages_effective_state transparent_hugepages_enabled appServerPorts dfsDisabled dfsMasterPort enableSplunkWebSSL httpport kvStoreDisabled kvStorePort mgmtHostPort minFreeSpace sessionTimeout startwebserver trustedIP SPLUNK_DB SPLUNK_HOME | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_instance_fields`

| stats values(Splunk_Roles) AS Splunk_Roles by Splunk_Instance | where Splunk_Roles="shc_captain" | eval Splunk_Roles = mvfilter(match(Splunk_Roles,"shc_captain|SHC")) | eval Splunk_Instance=upper(Splunk_Instance) | table Splunk_Roles Splunk_Instance
| stats count by isForwarding | where isForwarding!="N/A" | eval isForwarding=if(isForwarding=1, "Yes", "No")
| stats count AS "# of Instances" by os_version | sort - count
| stats count AS "# of Instances" by os_name | rename os_name AS OS

| table idxcluster_label Splunk_Instance mount_point fs_type capacity_$unit_tok2$ free_$unit_tok2$ | rename idxcluster_label As "IDX Cluster Label" Splunk_Instance As "Indexer" mount_point As "File System" fs_type As "File System Type" capacity_MB As "Capacity (MB)" capacity_GB As "Capacity (GB)" capacity_TB As "Capacity (TB)" free_MB As "Free Space (MB)" free_GB As "Free Space (GB)" free_TB As "Free Space (TB)"

ol.li: GMC Jobs / GMC Gen Jobs GMC Assets Gen Job

search.query: | stats count by Splunk_Instance | where Splunk_Instance!="Undefined"
| stats count by last_successful_login | eval last_successful_login_d = strftime(last_successful_login, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

| table identity shcluster_label emp_name email last_successful_login work_city work_region work_country emp_ttl emp_lob emp_dep emp_type emp_status emp_cc emp_loc emp_floor managedBy bunit startDate endDate Contractor_Expiration locked-out first last phone `gmc_comment("capabilities,imported_capabilities")` | convert ctime(last_successful_login) | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_splunk_roles_fields` | rename shcluster_label As "SH Cluster Label"

format.field: Inherited Total Search job disk quota
Inherited User-level Concurrent search job limit
User-level Concurrent real-time Search job limit (rtSrchJobsQuota)

ol.li: GMC Jobs / GMC Gen Jobs / GMC Identities Gen Job
GMC Jobs / GMC Gen Jobs / SH Tier Gen Jobs / Search Head Splunk Roles

html.a: REST API Reference Access endpoint for authorization/roles

search.query: | stats count by Splunk_Instance | where Splunk_Instance!="Undefined"

| fields identity shcluster_label emp_name emp_type emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob splunk_role_map imported_roles srchDiskQuota imported_srchDiskQuota srchJobsQuota imported_srchJobsQuota rtSrchJobsQuota imported_rtSrchJobsQuota cumulativeSrchJobsQuota cumulativeRTSrchJobsQuota srchIndexesAllowed imported_srchIndexesAllowed srchIndexesDefault imported_srchIndexesDefault srchJobsQuota_Final | table identity shcluster_label emp_name emp_type emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob splunk_role_map imported_roles srchDiskQuota imported_srchDiskQuota srchJobsQuota_Final srchJobsQuota imported_srchJobsQuota rtSrchJobsQuota imported_rtSrchJobsQuota cumulativeSrchJobsQuota cumulativeRTSrchJobsQuota srchIndexesAllowed imported_srchIndexesAllowed srchIndexesDefault imported_srchIndexesDefault | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_splunk_roles_fields` | rename shcluster_label As "SH Cluster Label"

format.field: User-level Concurrent real-time Search job limit (rtSrchJobsQuota)
Role-level Concurrent Real-Time Search job limit (cumulativeRTSrchJobsQuota)
User-level Concurrent real-time Search job limit (rtSrchJobsQuota)
User-level Concurrent RT Search job limit (rtSrchJobsQuota)
Role-level Concurrent RT Search job limit (cumulativeRTSrchJobsQuota)
Inherited User-level Concurrent search job limit (imported_srchJobsQuota)
Inherited User-level Concurrent RT Search job limit (imported_rtSrchJobsQuota)
Inherited Total Search job disk quota (imported_srchDiskQuota)

panel.title: 9. Concurrency Field Descriptions from authorization/roles REST API Response keys

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_fields_all_csv_lookup | where Index="REST" | table Component Sub_Component Field_Name Field_Display_Name Field_Description | sort Field_Name

panel.title: 10. Geographical Location by User rendered on a world map

search.query: | fields identity emp_name work_city work_region work_country | `get_geo_info(work_city,work_region,work_country)` | eval work_region = if(work_region="undefined", work_country, work_region) | strcat emp_name . " (" . work_city . ", " . work_region . ")" , emp_name | geostats count by emp_name latfield=work_lat longfield=work_long globallimit=0 locallimit=0 maxzoomlevel=18
